title: Fireside With The Underboss - Yous Are Gonna Die Today
description: During a late night game of poker at one of his clubs, Sammy notices that one of the players has some sticky fingers. Sammy and Toddo sit the guy down and explain to him that cheaters don't leave their club alive.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: During a late night game of poker at one of his clubs, Sammy notices that one of the players has some sticky fingers. Sammy and Toddo sit the guy down and explain to him that cheaters don't leave their club alive.
